QuestData.Title: Enlistment Day
QuestData.Description: You've come to enlist, right? Normally you'd have to stand in line like the other recruits. Normally you'd be out of luck because the recruitment ledger's gone missing and I can't process anyone until the new books get here.$B$BFortunately for you, $n, I've heard about you and what you did in Outland. To be honest, you're a cut above these poor saps. Lines aren't for you.$B$BGo to the barracks and speak to General Arlos. He'll be more than happy to meet with someone of your caliber.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with General Arlos inside the barracks in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: We've been expecting your arrival, $n. Welcome to Northrend.
